content.text:
[Table: table_20_170]

An Opal SSC compliant Storage Device SHALL return the following:
Feature Code
= 0x0001
Version
= 0x1 or any version that supports the defined features in this SSC
Length
= 0x0C
ComID Mgmt Supported
= VU
Streaming Supported
= 1
Buffer Mgmt Supported
= VU
ACK/NACK Supported
= VU
Async Supported
= VU
Sync Supported
= 1

| Bit | 7 | 6 | 5 | 4 | 3 | 2 | 1 | 0 |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Byte** | | | | | | | | |
| 0 | (MSB) | | | | | | | |
| | | | | | | | | Feature Code (0x0001) |
| | | | | | | | | |
| 1 | | | | | | | | (LSB) |
| 2 | | | | | | | | Version |
| | | | | | | | | Reserved |
| 3 | | | | | | | | Length |
| 4 | Reserved | ComID Mgmt Supported | Reserved | Streaming Supported | Buffer Mgmt Supported | ACK/NAK Supported | Async Supported | Sync Supported |
| 5 - 15 | | | | | | | | Reserved |
